Title: Azumanga Daioh: Gekijou Tanpen
Description:
["In this short movie featuring familiar characters from Azumanga Daioh, Osaka is yet again having a strange dream of Chiyo-Chan's pigtails being posessed. As Chiyo-Chan's pigtails bounce out of the window, who knows if young Chiyo will ever be happy again.", '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
Voices: ['Matsuoka, Yuki', 'Asakawa, Yuu', 'Kaneda, Tomoko', 'Higuchi, Chieko', 'Hiramatsu, Akiko', 'Kuwashima, Houko', 'Tanaka, Rie', 'Nogawa, Sakura']
Staff: [['Nishikiori, Hiroshi', 'Director, Storyboard, Screenplay'], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', 'Sound Director'], ['Itou, Masumi', 'Theme Song Composition, Theme Song Arrangement'], ['Azuma, Kiyohiko', 'Original Creator']]
